item.title: Bad ways to run a user group
item.description: I love user groups and I always want there to be more. I’m not a perfect organiser but I run reasonable groups. When I see organisers doing it badly, it makes me sad. There’s lots of great ways to run a user group, but I thought I’d cover some of the bad ways to run a user group. The anti-patterns if you will ðŸ˜€ Don’t advertise Your group isn’t on Twitter.
